content: AF-D FT PL SPX Threaded flap disc Ultimate plastic-backed flat flap discs with thread for rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered specifically for your most demanding metalwork – chamfer edges or do any other aggressive material removal jobs with far less time spent replacing the abrasives Flap discs are more comfortable to grind with – due to lower vibration, longer lifespan and fewer deep marks Threaded backing plate – for nut-free, faster replacement Trimmable flap disc – extends the lifespan and reach Flat shape – smaller abrasive contact area Applications Rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel and other metals Removing or blending welds on stainless steel, steel and other metals Chamfering edges for weld preparation on stainless steel, steel and other metals Removing burrs from rough cuts on stainless steel, steel and other metals Cleaning rust or paint on stainless steel, steel and other metals ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Backing: Plastic with thread Blade / disc shape: Flat - Type 27 Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Backing | Plastic with thread | Blade / disc shape | Flat - Type 27 | Base material | Stainless steel, Steel ### ITEMS- 2243369 - Flap disc AF-D 4.5 H P36-40 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243313 - Flap disc AF-D 4.5 H P60 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243363 - Flap disc AF-D 4.5 H P80 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243272 - Flap disc AF-D 5 H P36-40 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243375 - Flap disc AF-D 5 H P60 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243263 - Flap disc AF-D 5 H P80 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc
